definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The biggest story of the Berlin Olympics was American track-and-field star Jesse Owens.
sentences.chinese: 最大的故事柏林奥运会是美国田径明星杰西欧文斯。

sentences.english: My husband voiced no objection, and Owens and Bronwen smiled broadly.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫没有表示反对，欧文斯与布朗文咧开嘴笑了。

sentences.english: Jesse Owens died of cancer in nineteen eighty.
sentences.chinese: 杰西欧文斯在十九八十死于癌症。

sentences.english: Owens Valley in California lies on the western edge of the Great Basin.
sentences.chinese: 加州的欧文斯谷处在大盆地的西部边缘。

sentences.english: Bills receiver Terrell Owens keeps one at home.
sentences.chinese: 票据接收员特雷尔欧文斯家里装了一个。

sentences.english: Owens Corning has 12 plants in these countries.
sentences.chinese: 欧文斯科宁在这些国家有12个工厂。
欧文斯答道，“谁比谁更有价值？
什么是欧文斯科宁屋面系统？

sentences.english: Owens answers, “Worth more to whom?The elephant or the person?
sentences.chinese: 欧文斯答道，“谁比谁更有价值？

sentences.english: They thought they were kings, " Fouche said of the Owenses."
sentences.chinese: 福凯这样评价欧文斯夫妇，“他们把自己当成国王了。

sentences.english: Everybody sort of knew they were against logging.
sentences.chinese: 大家都心知肚明，欧文斯夫妇是在反对伐木业。

sentences.english: His family members operate the Jesse Owens Foundation.
sentences.chinese: 他的家人经营的杰西欧文斯基金会。

sentences.english: Today we tell the story of athlete Jesse Owens.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我们告诉运动员杰西欧文斯的故事。

sentences.english: Hillman has often referred to Buck Owens as "a mentor."
sentences.chinese: 希尔曼经常巴克欧文斯称为“导师”。

definition: Sanders (name)/Bernie Sanders, United States Senator from Vermont and 2016 Presidential candidate
